content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day November 22, 2022 Abusing Remote Administration Tools November 22, 2022 The bad, worse and the horrible by Gunnar Guðmundsson and Axel Marinho Guðmundsson Introduction In this article, we look at a malware payload from an exploited Microsoft Word document.
